017package org.apache.juneau.rest;
018
019import java.io.*;
020
021import org.apache.http.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.*;
023import org.apache.juneau.cp.*;
024import org.apache.juneau.http.response.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.rest.converter.*;
026import org.apache.juneau.rest.guard.*;
027import org.apache.juneau.rest.logger.*;
028
029/**
030 * A session for a single HTTP request.
031 *
032 * <p>
033 * This session object gets created by {@link RestSession} once the Java method to be invoked has been determined.
034 *
035 * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
036 *    <li class='warn'>This class is not thread safe.
037 * </ul>
038 *
039 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
040 * </ul>
041 */
042public class RestOpSession extends ContextSession {
043
044   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
045   // Static
046   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
047
048   /**
049    * Static creator.
050    *
051    * @param ctx The context object of the Java method being invoked.
052    * @param session The REST session object creating this object.
053    * @return A new builder.
054    */
055   public static Builder create(RestOpContext ctx, RestSession session) {
056      return new Builder(ctx, session);
057   }
058
059   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
060   // Builder
061   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
062
063   /**
064    * Builder class.
065    */
066   public static class Builder extends ContextSession.Builder {
067
068      final RestOpContext ctx;
069      final RestSession session;
070
071      /**
072       * Constructor.
073       *
074       * @param ctx The context object of the Java method being invoked.
075       * @param session The REST session object creating this object.
076       */
077      public Builder(RestOpContext ctx, RestSession session) {
078         super(ctx);
079         this.ctx = ctx;
080         this.session = session;
081      }
082
083      /**
084       * Sets the logger to use when logging this call.
085       *
086       * @param value The new value for this setting.  Can be <jk>null</jk>.
087       * @return This object.
088       */
089      public Builder logger(CallLogger value) {
090         session.logger(value);
091         return this;
092      }
093
094      /**
095       * Enables or disabled debug mode on this call.
096       *
097       * @param value The new value for this setting.
098       * @return This object.
099       * @throws IOException Occurs if request content could not be cached into memory.
100       */
101      public Builder debug(boolean value) throws IOException {
102         session.debug(value);
103         return this;
104      }
105
106      @Override /* Session.Builder */
107      public RestOpSession build() {
108         return new RestOpSession(this);
109      }
110   }
111
112   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
113   // Instance
114   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
115
116   private final RestOpContext ctx;
117   private final RestSession session;
118   private final RestRequest req;
119   private final RestResponse res;
120
121   /**
122    * Constructor.
123    *
124    * @param builder The builder for this object.
125    */
126   protected RestOpSession(Builder builder) {
127      super(builder);
128      ctx = builder.ctx;
129      session = builder.session;
130      try {
131         req = session.getBeanStore().add(RestRequest.class, ctx.createRequest(session));
132         res = session.getBeanStore().add(RestResponse.class, ctx.createResponse(session, req));
133      } catch (RuntimeException e) {
134         throw e;
135      } catch (Exception e) {
136         throw new InternalServerError(e);
137      }
138   }
139
140   @Override /* ContextSession */
141   public RestOpContext getContext() {
142      return ctx;
143   }
144
145   /**
146    * Runs this session.
147    *
148    * <p>
149    * Does the following:
150    * <ol>
151    *    <li>Runs the guards on the method.
152    *    <li>Finds the parameter values to pass to the Java method.
153    *    <li>Invokes the Java method.
154    *    <li>Sets the output and status on the response.
155    *    <li>Calls the converters on the Java method.
156    * </ol>
157    *
158    * @throws Throwable Any throwable can be thrown.
159    */
160   public void run() throws Throwable {
161
162      for (RestGuard guard : ctx.getGuards())
163         if (! guard.guard(req, res))
164            return;
165
166      ctx.getMethodInvoker().invoke(this);
167
168      if (res.hasContent())
169         for (RestConverter converter : ctx.getConverters())
170            res.setContent(converter.convert(req, res.getContent().orElse(null)));
171   }
172
173   /**
174    * Returns the REST request object for this session.
175    *
176    * @return The REST request object for this session.
177    */
178   public RestRequest getRequest() {
179      return req;
180   }
181
182   /**
183    * Returns the REST response object for this session.
184    *
185    * @return The REST response object for this session.
186    */
187   public RestResponse getResponse() {
188      return res;
189   }
190
191   /**
192    * Returns the bean store for this session.
193    *
194    * @return The bean store for this session.
195    */
196   public BeanStore getBeanStore() {
197      return session.getBeanStore();
198   }
199
200   /**
201    * Returns the context of the parent class of this Java method.
202    *
203    * @return The context of the parent class of this Java method.
204    */
205   public RestContext getRestContext() {
206      return session.getContext();
207   }
208
209   /**
210    * Returns the session of the parent class of this Java method.
211    *
212    * @return The session of the parent class of this Java method.
213    */
214   public RestSession getRestSession() {
215      return session;
216   }
217
218   /**
219    * Sets the status of the response.
220    *
221    * @param value The new status.
222    * @return This object.
223    */
224   public RestOpSession status(StatusLine value) {
225      session.status(value);
226      return this;
227   }
228
229   /**
230    * Called at the end of a call to finish any remaining tasks such as flushing buffers and logging the response.
231    *
232    * @return This object.
233    */
234   public RestOpSession finish() {
235      try {
236         res.flushBuffer();
237         req.close();
238      } catch (Exception e) {
239         session.exception(e);
240      }
241      return this;
242   }
243}
